Scatter the Invaders.name: Scatter the Invaders
Scatter the Invaders.flavor: You strike out at one foe and send it staggering into other nearby enemies.
Scatter the Invaders.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack.
Scatter the Invaders.secondaryTarget: Each enemy adjacent to the primary target
Scatter the Invaders.secondaryOnHit: You push the secondary target 1 square.

Guardian's Word.name: Guardian's Word
Guardian's Word.flavor: Your dragonmark glows and empowers your healing.
keywords: Personal   Effect: The next healing power you use before the start of your next turn restores the maximum number of hit points possible.
Guardian's Word.effect: The next healing power you use before the start of your next turn restores the maximum number of hit points possible.

Sanctuary Strike.name: Sanctuary Strike
Sanctuary Strike.flavor: You swing, striking your foes and emitting a shower of energy from your dragon mark to empower your allies.
Sanctuary Strike.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any ally can use his or her second wind as a minor action while within 3 squares of you.
